document_data.name: Gauntlet of Winds
document_data.mainbody: '''''Gauntlet of winds''''' was a [[Divine magic|divine]] [[alteration]] and [[evocation]] [[spell]] used by priests devoted to [[Shaundakul]], enabling them to enchant their [[gauntlet]].
document_data.Effects: This spell allowed the caster to imbue their gauntlet with several magical properties including ''[[feather fall]], [[gust of wind]], [[wind wall]]'', or ''[[calm winds]]''. Each effect would last for one minute unless that power was selected again. The spell would lapse if the caster's concentration was broken.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, this spell required as a [[material component]] the caster's [[holy symbol]] to cast.
